RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FERRARI RED broke in and raced near the back to the turn then moved up from two wide on the turn then moved out to three wide in upper stretch to run down the leader and cleared late. SHUDDER sprinted to a clear lead to the top of the stretch and was caught at the eighth pole and fought gamely to be second best. WHAT THE HEY hustled along to prompt the pace to mid stretch and weakened. BIG MOONIE ducked in at the start then raced at the back to the turn and checked slightly nearing the three furlong marker but was never a threat. CHASING THE KING broke well, was off the pace to the turn and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Ferrari Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickey Wendy and Martinez Jr O A
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, near back, 2wturn, 3wupper, ran down leader

ENTRY.NAME: Big Moonie
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in start, checked 3/8, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Shudder
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, caught, gamely, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 10700. FOR COLORADO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTY GIRL dueled for the lead from between horses to the half mile marker then shook loose to a clear lead and proved best. FLYING LADY dueled for the early lead from the inside to the half mile marker then dropped back on the turn, moved out to four wide in upper stretch to rally for the place. JUST A SEC was off the pace from four wide to the turn then moved in to three wide around the turn but was no match for the winner. MS BUMBLEBEE dueled for the early lead from three wide to the half mile marker then prompted the pace to the top of the stretch and weakened. LAST AMIGA was last away spotting the field several lengths, saved ground around the turn then moved out to two wide in upper stretch to improve position. TUDIE LU raced near the back on the backstretch then moved up from two wide on the turn and flattened out. SHADOWINTHECLOUDS saved ground but was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Last Amiga
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, saved ground turn, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROMPTLY DONE broke well then settled off the pace to the top of stretch then was asked and engaged the leader at the eighth pole and drove clear. GEORGIANO tracked the leaders while saving ground around the turn then made a rail bid down the stretch and proved second best. MISCHIEVIOUSLANIE sprinted to a clear lead around the turn but was collared at the eighth pole and tired. T R'S FIRST was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Georgiano
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, tracked leaders, rail bid stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Promptly Done
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, off pace, engaged 1/8, drove clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIGRID was off the pace from the inside then moved up from three wide on the turn to take command nearing the quarter pole and drew clear. CREES VALENTYME sprinted to a clear lead but was collared at the five sixteenths pole but kept on to be a clear second. SMOKIN AMELIA raced in the middle of the pack from four wide down the backstretch, saved ground around the turn then made a rail bid in the stretch to be up for the show. CAROLYN'S WAY saved ground through the turn then moved out to three wide in upper stretch and moved between horses in deep stretch to improve position. CHASING DIVINITY pressed the pace to the quarter pole and weakened. BRING THE POSSE steadied early and remained back. LOTTA PRADA tracked the leaders to the top of the stretch and gave way. KNIGHT EYES stumbled at the start, distanced and eased.

ENTRY.NAME: Sigrid
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Rusty Wire Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, 3wturn, took command 1/4, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Crees Valentyme
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, collared 5/16, kept on, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Amelia
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, saved ground turn, rail bid stretch, up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $3500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORTHERN QUEST raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground around the turn then slipped through at the top of the stretch and engaged the leader and dug in in the final sixteenth to prevail. THREE BALL chased the top two around the turn then moved out to three wide and engaged the leader at the top of the stretch but was outfinished. MOST AMUSING co-led from the inside to the seven sixteenths pole then edged away but was collared at the top of the stretch and fought gamely from between rivals to the final yard to give way grudgingly. JIMBO'S BIZ raced in the middle of the pack to the top of the stretch then moved out to four wide and faltered. ITS FIVE SOMEWHERE was always back. HOT ARTIE co-led from the two path to the seven sixteenths, kept on to the top of the stretch but gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, slip thru, dug in, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Three Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top two, 3wturn, engaged leader, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAHLIA'S DANCER sprinted away to a clear lead and was kept to task in the stretch. HIGH GUNNER tracked the leaders down the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the turn but was no match for the winner. AMY D prompted the pace from the two path to the quarter pole and weakened. ANGIE'S REVRAC raced five wide through the turn then made a mid track rally. TEQUILA RITA was last away, moved up through the turn from two or three wide and moved out to five wide at the eighth pole and flattened out. LUNA ROSE chased the leaders to the top of the stretch and gave way. POPS GIRL ALEXA raced in the middle of the pack from the inside but was not a factor. EXPECT THE BOSS raced in the middle of the pack but was not a threat. SHASTAWIN had good early speed then slowly retreated and jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Rita
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, moved up turn, 5w1/8, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Dahlia's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, clear lead, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Shastawin
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, slowly retreated, jogged in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 5600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRISCO KID was off the pace on the inside then cut the corner into the stretch and took command at the eighth pole and drew off. CASH EXPRESS raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch, moved up from five wide around the turn and into the stretch but was not enough but proved second best. FRIENDLY FOE had good early speed to press the pace to the eighth pole and fought gamely to deep stretch and gave way grudgingly. ABRIERWIN rushed up to take the lead but was collared at the three sixteenths pole and weakened. SHADYFIED trailed the field through the turn then made a late stretch rally to improve position. BULL RING saved ground but was not a factor. CAPTAIN COMEBACK raced in the middle of the pack but failed to menace. CHICKEN N BISCUIT was close up on the pace to the top of the stretch but never made a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Frisco Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail bid, took command, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Friendly Foe
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, pressed pace, gamely, grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Leo Beau Dash S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 400 Y Dirt CR: 82. Stakes Purse 17850. PURSE $17,850. 3 year olds and older. Weight 124lbs. Runs: Sunday July 16. If race fails to fill with 6 Colorado Breds by 9:30am race will be opened with Colorado Breds preferred. Added money of $2500 by RMQHA will be awarded to participating Colorado Br eds only. $50 to nominate $350 to enter. Nominations close Friday July 7.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL NIGHT ROC speed, held on. LA PANAMA WEST hard fought loss. KALI K closed fastest. JESS UN SIES MAS dueled thru out. KICKIN GOOD TIME dueled all the way. OUR SECRET HABIT gamely, out kicked.

ENTRY.NAME: All Night Roc
ENTRY.OWNER: Frey Dean R and Case Harvey
